website_summaries.verdict: Includes all the features girls love at an unbeatable price. A great option for the bargain shopper.
pros: A rugged but attractive bike in the BMX style with 20-inch tires
Has easy-to-use coaster brakes and strong steel frame
Handlebars are padded and sport streamers
cons: It's not as fancy as other bikes we reviewed, but it's cute and well-made, especially considering its budget price

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this unless you want to roll the dice ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this unless you want to roll the dice on the front wheel fitting on the bike. As others have reported, front fork is too narrow for the wheel and cannot widen it by hand, so you cannot attach the front wheel. Obvious this company doesn't care about quality control, as these issues were reported 6+ months ago and still haven't been fixed. In addition, there was metal debris inside the front steerer tube that I had to dig out via brute force in order to get the handlebar stem to fit. S
customer_reviews.author: Justin Evans

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the Negative Reviews
customer_reviews.text: We almost didn't purchase this bike because of so many negative reviews. In the end we opted to give it a try as it was a replacement gift for a neighbor. My husband is a bike junky from mountain biking, down hilling. BMX and being a guru with brands. He has expressed the necessity to write a Five star review. He said it was easy to put together, tires fit into forks easily, colors are perfect for a girl, simple design with a kick stand and no hand brakes to tackle up. Give it a try. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Front wheel does not fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the bike without reading the reviews, bad move. There is no way you can make the front wheel fit without bending the frame, which would require more than arm strength and would damage the bike. Poor craftsmanship, poor quality control, if you buy it you have a high likelihood of having to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Got the second bike. Negative stars ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ Again no Taino g wheels no brake Assy. I double checked the instructions says they are part of the check list before you build it. Calling Dynacraft tomorrow. Bike is missing the training wheel assy. Bike is missing front brake assy. Child has to wait for parts or new bike on birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Nightlog

customer_reviews.title: piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: This bike has been nothing but a disappointment since my daughter received it for Christmas. The chain has popped off spontaneously at least ten times, and now the pedal snapped in half this morning as she was riding it to school! Seriously?!
customer_reviews.author: frequentshopper543

customer_reviews.title: Nice easy assembly bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived very well packed, double boxed. Only took a little time to put on the handle bars, pedals and air up the tires. Very happy with the bike and donated it to our local toys for tots.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Heim

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be pretty easy to put together. We ended up with an extra pad that goes along the center bar of the bike and I am not quite sure why, but we will be keeping it just in case we need it in the future. My daughter loves the colors and it seems to have a very smooth ride.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy's An Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves her bike!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my youngest baby girl for Xmas! She loves it and rides it almost everyday! ❤️ Love it! It was easy to assemble! She did it herself with assistance!
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Petit

customer_reviews.title: More than what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter, who is seven, for Christmas. It is the perfect size and a great value for the money. She rides it almost everyday. It is easy to assemble and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shemeka Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is soon to turn 6. It's a tad hard for her to get on it, but she figures it out and her legs are able to extend all the way. Great bike that will be able to last her a few years. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Kindblade

customer_reviews.title: Front was welded wrong. Wheel wouldn't fit. Had ...
customer_reviews.text: Front was welded wrong. Wheel wouldn't fit. Had to return and look for one locally so could have for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: A little spendy compared to local purchase bikes of comparable size.. but cute, was easy to assemble and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: PFarm

customer_reviews.title: QC Lacking
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer noted, the front forks were too narrow to install the front tire. It was too narrow to widen by hand. Bike was cute, but returned since I could not assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Parks

customer_reviews.title: great bike for a grand daughter
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together and my granddaughter loves the bike
customer_reviews.author: sloopy1948

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Can't get the front wheel on. Really really upset. Christmas is ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Forks bent
customer_reviews.text: Forks were bent. Friend was able to fix it. Was a gift. Super bummed
customer_reviews.author: JDThom

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, easily assembled
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, sturdy, easily assembled, and the daughter loves it...she finally learned how to ride her 12", so this was her reward
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my granddaughter. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pedals and screws.
customer_reviews.text: Missing pedals and screws. We wanted to return it but It’s so heavy and my daughter cannot wait to bike around, good thing we have an old bike; so we took the old pedals from her old bike and put it in so she can use it. I will add a photo as soon as they come home from tom.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn d.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad bike
customer_reviews.text: Must be hit or miss with this bike. Mine did not have any issues assembling. Took about 20min max to assemble. Front wheel went on as expected, kid was thrilled. All in all, there are better bikes, but for my tall 8 y.o this is perfect until I upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Bike love
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift to my granddaughter and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great bike but flat tire.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great bike. We got this for my daughter’s birthday and she loves it. I gave it only 3 stars as it came with a flat tire. We have put air in it several times and it keeps going flat. Other than the flat tire it is great and I would have given in 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas present this year!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived within a week just in time for Christmas. Easy assembly, no problems. My Granddaughter loves her new bike, she rides it every day. Great price for one of the best Christmas gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaM

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Cute bike my daughter loved it. Pretty vibrant colors. Just waiting on her dad to put it together. "Ugh" rolls eyes...just kidding.
customer_reviews.author: mz. braz

customer_reviews.title: they did not have the bike seat
customer_reviews.text: I sent this as a gift for my niece as a Christmas Gift, Christmas Eve a friend put the bike together so it could be wrapped with a bow for my niece X-mas morning and low and behold, no seat... very disappointing....
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Came in great condition. Granddaughter very happy. Husband had no problems putting this bike together. Well Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. Nothing too fancy but my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Handle bars not tightened down. I understand my return period has expired. My granddaughter started riding this bike only a month ago. What can we do to rectify this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Marlane

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with brakes!!
customer_reviews.text: This bike didn’t come with brakes. It was for my 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective Front Fork
customer_reviews.text: We made the mistake of not listening to other reviews we read. Unfortunately, we also received a defective front fork that was too narrow for the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny H.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble perfect for my 7 year old as far as size. Price was excellent!
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: great price and it is exactly as it looks in the picture. Product came in a box that was perfect for this item. No dents or bangs.
customer_reviews.author: LEO N.

customer_reviews.title: Solid. I'd by another one. Worth the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid. I'd by another one. Worth the price to get a Dynacraft bike over any Walmart bike.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter Christmas present and she loves it, very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. My daughter loves the colors and needs to grow another inch. But the bike is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Real good quality, my daughter enjoy it to the max
customer_reviews.author: G-2wise/Ernesto T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Seems to be of excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Mel L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. arrived a day early. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: IMWileCoyote

customer_reviews.title: My husband said it was super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for my daughters 8th birthday she absolutely loves it. My husband said it was super easy to put together..nice bike.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: It came in on time
customer_reviews.text: It was good, got it in time. She love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Bent rear wheel on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited as I assembled it. Then I realized the rear wheel was bent up bad and it gave a lot of resistance to pedaling. Maybe a fluke. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: There is a piece missing and NO one has gotten ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a piece missing and NO one has gotten back in touch with me about this matter since December 2017 it was a gift for my granddaughter and she can not ride it due to that missing piece unsatisfied WITH THIS MATTER
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Custome

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the item. It arrived on time and everything was received as promised!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, but the forks were too narrow for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bike, but the forks were too narrow for the tire and we had to use some muscles to make it right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This bike is very nice. If you have a young girl, she will love it.
customer_reviews.author: thenurse

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: Just 9 months old and the tire is shredding, rode very little, have to replace tire, not good
customer_reviews.author: maudie brainard

product_meta.title: Dynacraft 8109-25ZTJ Girls Sapphire Magna Bike, Silver / Pink, 20"
product_meta.description: The Magna Sapphire Girls BMX Street/Dirt 20" Bike is perfect for the street and off road. This versatile bike features BMX styling with amazing lines and color combinations. The steel black frame and rims are accented by bold pink, purple, and white graphics. This bike features a handle bar and body pads, an adjustable saddle seat, coaster brakes, and a kick stand which makes parking the bike a breeze. The Magna Sapphire also has tire and front and rear body reflectors to provide improved visibility at night.
feature_bullets: Girls straight frame BMX street/dirt bike w/coaster brakes
2-piece handlebar and frame pads with Sapphire design
Adjustable seat post and kick stand
Lifetime warranty on frame and fork
Recommended Ages 6 to 10; up to 105 lbs.
